summary: An ordinance relating to the condemnation proceedings for the acquisition of certain property in Township 26 N., Range 9 E., W. M., and Township 26 N., Range 8 E., W. M., for a water reservoir site on the Tolt River and a watermain pipeline right of way under Ordinance 87416, King County Cause No. 527801 as a part of the additions to and betterments to the water supply system contemplated by Ordinance 87150; and making an appropriation from the Municipal Water Revenue Bond 1958 Construction Fund for the payment of agreed awards when accepted.
